allodb 0.0.0.9004
  • Datasets and Functions Index
  • news
  • fgeo

allodb: Database of allometric equations

The goal of allodb is to develop, host and give access to tables of allometric equations for ForestGEO’s network.

Installation

To install allodb run the following code in R (and the notes below):

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("forestgeo/allodb", auth_token = "abc")

For details in how to install packages from GitHub see this article.

Example

library(allodb)
library(tibble)

equations
